entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who didn't have his mirror on him when he went through the archway. He is also referred to as someone Harry wants to see and talk to again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is trying to contact Sirius using a mirror.

entities.name: archway
entities.description: The archway is mentioned as a place where Sirius went through without his mirror.

relationships.description: Harry wants to see and talk to Sirius again, as mentioned in the text: 'He had been convinced, for a whole, shining minute, that he was going to see Sirius, talk to him again.'
Harry is not directly related to the archway, but it is mentioned as a place where Sirius went through without his mirror.
